Event.name: Dunking
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> temporarily places a <fen>Theme</fen> into a <fen>Substance</fen>, often with the intention to remove it later. The <fen>Substance</fen> may be metonymically represented by its container. The <fen>Theme</fen> may be partially or completely submerged.
<ex><fex name="Agent">She</fex> <t>dunked</t> <fex name="Theme">her sandwich</fex> <fex name="Substance">into some tomato soup</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> places the <fen>Theme</fen> into a <fen>Substance</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">She</fex> <t>dunked</t> her sandwich into some tomato soup.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Theme</fen> temporarily goes partially or completely into the Substance.
<ex>She <t>dunked</t> <fex name="Theme">her sandwich</fex> into some tomato soup.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Substance
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Substance</fen> is the fluid into which the <fen>Theme</fen> is placed. This may be metonymically represented by the container of the fluid.
<ex>She <t>dunked</t> her sandwich <fex name="Substance">into some tomato soup</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The way that the <fen>Agent</fen> puts <fen>Theme</fen> in the <fen>Substance</fen>.
<ex>He <fex name="Manner">slowly</fex> <t>dunked</t> the biscuit into the coffee.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location in time when the dunking occurs.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: dunk.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: temporarily submerge in a liquid.

lexUnit.name: dip.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: temporarily place into a liquid.
